> **Keep this doc bookmarked.**  
> Treat it like a punch-list: tick items off, add new tactics you discover, and iterate on the fly.

## 1. Tell a *Human* Story First ğŸ—£ï¸

**POC Formula**

| Step | What to share | Example |
|------|---------------|---------|
| **Problem** | The pain you felt | â€œI gained 15 kg while coding all day.â€ |
| **Outcome** | The positive win | â€œBuilt a calorie tracker, lost 5 kg, hit \$2 k MRR.â€ |
| **Challenge** | The next quest | â€œNow: can AI help me lose the other 10 kg?â€ |

Write the story once â†’ slice it into:

- 280-char tweet  
- 15 s [Instagram](https://instagram.com)/[TikTok](https://tiktok.com) reel  
- 1â€“2 min [YouTube](https://youtube.com) demo  
- Long-form [IndieHackers](https://indiehackers.com) post

The narrative stays; only the container changes.

## 2. Launch Stack (Week 0)

| Day | Channel | How-to |
|-----|---------|--------|
| **Day 0** | [`Show HN`](https://news.ycombinator.com/show) | One-line pitch + link. Engage fast in comments. |
| **Day 1** | [`r/SideProject`](https://reddit.com/r/SideProject) | â€œFeedback welcomeâ€ post. Reply to *every* comment. |
| **Day 2** | [Product Hunt](https://producthunt.com) | Schedule (12:01 am PT). Prep maker comment, 3 visuals. |
| **Day 3** | [Uneed](https://uneed.best), [TinyLaunch](https://tinylaunch.io), [DevHunt](https://devhunt.org) | Same assets, staggered by a few hours. |
| **Day 4** | Short-form video blast | [Instagram](https://instagram.com) Reels, [TikTok](https://tiktok.com), [YouTube Shorts](https://youtube.com/shorts). CTA â†’ PH page. |
| **Day 5/6** | [IndieHackers](https://indiehackers.com) â€œShow & Tellâ€ | Full build/metrics story. |

## 3. Two-Hour SEO Sprint (Week 1)

1. [AnswerSocrates](https://answersocrates.com) â†’ dump every question around your seed topic.  
2. One landing page per question (H1 = exact query, 500â€“700 words, internal links + CTA).  
3. [Google Search Console](https://search.google.com/search-console/about) â†’ *Request indexing* immediately.  
4. Pull GSC CSV â†’ sort by *Position* 8-20 â†’ spin out dedicated pages (these are â€œalmost rankingâ€ wins).  
5. **Reddit keyword boost**  
   - Grab niche subreddit URL  
   - Paste into [WordStream Free Keyword Tool](https://www.wordstream.com/keywords) â†’ export 500 terms  
   - Sprinkle top terms into titles, metas, H2s.

---

## 4. Relationship Growth (Week 2+)

### Micro-Influencer Outreach

1. Shortlist creators < 50 k followers in your niche.  
2. DM: **(Personal hook) + (give product free) + (ask for feedback, not promo).**  
3. Once they reply, **offer affiliate link or case-study angle** for a natural shout-out.

### Competitor Mentions Hack

- Set **Google Alerts** for rival brands.  
- When a fresh thread appears, drop value-first comment:

> â€œCuriousâ€”any reason youâ€™re not using **X**? It covers Z + S automatically, so you donâ€™t have to {pain}. Happy to send you a free code.â€

No spam; only join when genuinely relevant.

---

## 5. Maintain & Iterate

| Cadence | Task |
|---------|------|
| **Weekly** | Answer 3 fresh questions on [Quora](https://quora.com)/[Reddit](https://reddit.com) using your POC story. |
| **Bi-weekly** | Update GSC â€œalmost-thereâ€ keyword sheet; ship 1â€“2 new pages. |
| **Monthly** | Record a metrics recap video (wins + fails). Publish everywhere. |
| **Quarterly** | Audit directory linksâ€”swap low-traffic sites for new alternatives (check threads like [â€œdirectory of directoriesâ€](https://indiehackers.com) on IH for updates). :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2} |

## 6. Retention & Referral Flywheel

### Post-Signup Drip (Day 0â€“7)
1. **Welcome / Quick Win** â€“ help users hit their first â€œahaâ€ in < 5 minutes.  
2. **Deeper Use-Case** â€“ short tutorial or template that expands value.  
3. **Social Proof** â€“ share a customer win + invite reply for feedback.

### Ongoing Loops
- **In-app NPS (Day 14)** â†’ tag *Promoters* â†’ auto-email a referral link.  
- **Referral Mechanic** â€“ single-URL powered by Rewardful/LemonSqueezy; give 10 % credit or swag.  
- **â€œShare Your Winâ€ Wall** â€“ tiny form feeds a Notion sheet of testimonials you can reuse across PH, X, and newsletters.

---

## 7. Lifetime-Deal Pulse

| Platform | Why use it | Key Tips |
|----------|------------|----------|
| **AppSumo** | Massive early reach, reviewer culture | Cap usage clearly; record a crisp Loom demo; respond fast to reviews. |
| **DealMirror / Dealify** | Dev tools & AI utilities excel | Bundle minor add-ons (icons, template) to stand out. |
| **PitchGround / StackSocial** | Good for consumer-friendly SaaS | Cross-promo with complementary products for list-swap exposure. |

**Run 2-4 weeks max** and avoid lifetime promises you canâ€™t sustain.

---

## 8. Community Loops

### Targeted Communities
- **Slack / Discord** â€“ join niche groups *as a human first*. Share a code snippet or insight, then soft-drop your tool.  
- **Twitter Spaces / X Live** â€“ host a 20-min AMA (â€œHow I built X in 7 daysâ€); invite two micro-influencers as co-hosts.  
- **Guest Newsletters** â€“ offer a 150-word founder story + exclusive code to curated lists (e.g., TLDR Dev, TheSlice). One aligned send can drive 5â€“10 k clicks.

*Approach: value â†’ context â†’ ask.* Earn trust before pitching.


---

post.title: The Evergreen Launch & Growth Checklist for Start-ups and Side-Projects
post.description: A living, repeat-able playbook you can reuse (and expand) every time you ship something new.
